title: Asian Shares Primed to Advance, Dollar Declines: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks were poised to track US gains that pushed shares to fresh highs, as optimism over earnings prospects and regional growth underpinned sentiment.
content: Asian stocks were poised to track US gains that pushed shares to fresh highs, as optimism over earnings prospects and regional growth underpinned sentiment.
